author: billh
msg: Changed TextPainter API slightly, removed a number of hacks involving
creating TextLayout instances in order to compute geometry and

author: billh
msg: Fixed regression which meant that text fill of "Batik"
was not happenning.  Also restored order of rendering so that
overlapping text (ligature-like) is visible - I like this, think
it look Batik-y, but some may not.
The overlapping outlines could be removed by reversing the order
of the outline and fill paints, and doubling the outline width
(since  half of the outline stroke would thus be hidden).
